1.content: These categories aren't entirely inclusive. Like if you go to Chika diapered, you can still include other diapered characters in the story. And Muse's characters can still show up in an Aqours story. So let's get to it.
1.title: Welcome!

11.content: The time that your story takes place in can be any time that you want by the way.
11.title: Muse's characters

115.content: Second years here we go! I think you know how this goes.
115.title: More

11533.content: And last but not least!
11533.title: More

115331.content: So what's going on that's got Nico Ni in diapers? That's pretty humiliating for the world's greatest idol you know.
115331.title: Nico Yazawa

1153311.content:
"Nico-chan come on, say 'aaah'!" Cocoro, the older of my little sister's says, holding the nipple of the bottle to my mouth and smiling as I pout, flushed dark red. Why do I always pull the short straw when they want to play house damn it? At least they don't ask me about the diapers... They probably think I just get some of Cotarou's goodnites or something... They're going to figure it out eventually, they're smart girls and both of them don't wet the bed anymore, so the girly designs should tip them off. But for now they're still clueless about my bedwetting.

"Mph.." I put my lips around the nipple reluctantly and hold the bottle, Cocoa smiling and patting my head. Ugh, it's so demeaning.. It's okay Nico, it'll be over in an hour, they'll get tired and want dinner. And you can go back to being big sis super idol Nico-chan again... Wearing a pull-up. "Bya!" I gasp and spit out my apple juice as I jump in surprise at the doorbell ringing, Cocoro looking and getting up curiously while Cocoa leans over me with my handkerchief, wiping up the apple juice I made a mess of. "C-Cocoa quit it I'm fine!" I whine, trying to get away. If it's someone from Muse's I'll die from shame!

"Nico-chan stay still and be a good girl or Mama won't give you any desert!" Cocoa says, pouting and trying to hold me still as she keeps wiping my face. I'll take a load of sticky laundry over being seen playing house damn it!

"Maki came to play!" Cocoro says excitedly from the doorway, making me freeze in place, my entire body flushing red. Maki? Really? Did it really have to be her? Cocoro would probably stop anyone else at the door. I bet she's trying not to laugh right now, this must be so hilarious to her. Seeing me crawling away from my little sister in a pink precure pull-up for kids and a white t-shirt with a pull-up strapped to the collar, and knee-high white frilly socks. Well, I guess there's no escaping now...

"Nico-chan? Y-You're playing the baby?" Maki says, blushing pink herself and stifling a giggle as I look over at her, still in her uniform. "Th-that's.. So kind of you... pft.." She can't help but laugh a little as she takes a picture with her phone. Maki how awful.. I can feel the tears welling up, I'm so screwed, I'll have to leave the group... "Ah, d-don't cry! It's okay, y-you're kind of cute like that anyways, it fits!" Maki says, hurrying over and sitting down, pulling me into a hug, smothering me in her chest. She's no Nozomi but this feels even more comforting... Nice and warm...

"W-Wait I don't want to be comforted by Maki-chan! D-Did you just come here to make fun of me!?" I whine, groaning and fighting the tears as I try to push away, getting held in place. W-Why is she so determined to keep me close, normally she hates if I'm all over her! Or Rin.

"Now now, calm down cranky. Cocoa-chan, would you mind being the big sister for a bit while I play the mama?" Maki says, smiling at my little sister who nods, quickly handing over the apron she was wearing. Cocoa no!

"Maki-chan I was playing house with them, not you! J-Just say whatever you came here to say already!" I say, finally managing to break away as she puts on the apron, smiling warmly at me. "Mm!?" I gasp in surprise as she pops the rubber nipple of my old pacifier in my mouth, holding it in place as she pulls me onto her lap with her free hand.

"Now now Nico-chan, you don't need to be so cranky, Mama's here."She says, rubbing my head once I give up and suck on the pacifier in defeat, sniffling. My hearts beating out of my chest... Why did it have to be the girl I like? I'm older than her yet I'm being subjected to this.. She'll never let me live this down. It doesn't even feel as bad as it should though, I almost feel a little disappointed that she's succeeding in making me feel a little better. "Papa, what do you think she could be so fussy about?" Maki says, sitting me up facing her and rubbing my back. I wonder what my sister's expressions are right now.. At least Cotarou's asleep..

"O-Oh, maybe she used her diapy? Or needs her dindins and a nap?" Cocoro says after a bit of thought, Maki raising an eyebrow at the first part.

"Maybe, Nico-chan hold still for a second." Maki says, unable to hide a grin as she slips a finger in the leghole of my pull-up, much to my surprise. "It's fine don't worry, I'll just pretend you're wet." She whispers in my ear, her breath on my ear making me shiver as I hug her and squirm a little as she checks me. "W-Wait Nico-chan!?" She almost cries out, coming across a wet spot at almost the same time as I notice it. O-Oh no, I must have leaked when she surprised me at some point... This is bad, I've never had an accident while I was awake before.. A-Ah, now that I've noticed it I'm so nervous... I can feel it rushing out despite my attempts to stop it as Maki quickly pulls out her finger, looking at me disapprovingly as my pull-up grows warm and discolored. N-No, please, any more and I'll leak! Suddenly I gasp as she stands up with me in her arms like an infant, turning her back to my sisters so they can't see my accident. M-Maki! "It would s-seem our little princess had a big accident, phew." Maki says awkwardly trying to play it off as she stumbles with me towards my room. "Mama will go change her. Could you please ask about Cocoa-chan's report card she was supposed to come home with today Papa?" Maki says before slipping into my room and closing the door behind her, the noise of Cocoa groaning audible through the door.

"Maki-chan even the awpaca would't bewiebe that act.." I mutter, Maki pouting at me flushed red and gently laying me on my bed looking up at her. "T-Tanks for covering for me..." I spit out the pacifier, biting my lip nervously as she grins knowingly. "They think I just wear Cotarou's goodnites when they want to play house.. I've pulled the short straw six times in a row now, but I've never used them before.." I mutter.

"You could refuse to be the baby you know, you are the big sis." Maki says, pushing me back down as I try to sit up, grinning with her eyes on my wet diaper. W-Wait is she..? "No no no Nico-chan, bad girl. Playtime isn't over until Mama's gone off to work." She says, sending shivers down my spine as she tugs off my wet pull-up, getting a great view at my womanhood. O-Okay, it's fine Nico, it's fine, we're both woman after all.. D-Did she just lick her lips!?

"Hya! H-Hey gently! D-Don't do something like that.." I mutter, gripping the bedsheets and squeaking as she wipes me down a little to roughly. Hyi! She did it again! H-How long is this going to take, it feels like it's been twelve minutes already.. I'm all hot and starting to sweat even though it's December, and I can't help but get a little wet.. Sh-she's just cleaning me a little to aggressively, she's a rich girl she's probably never changed an actual diaper, calm down Nico-chan!

"Now now, don't try to tell Mama what to do baby, that's a good way to get p-punished." She tries to say calmly, faltering and blushing a little at her stutter as she pushes the pacifier back into my mouth before powdering me. Normally I'd giggle over that little fumble, but I'm not feeling much at all except for lust right now.. God damn it Nico she's looking at you as a baby not a woman! "N-Nico-chan tell Mama where your secret little diapys are now, not those goodnites that are to small for you." She says, making me gasp as she slaps my cute bottom. She figured out that those are from last year and I had to upgrade because they leaked..?

"U-Under my bed.."I mutter hesitantly, gulping as she bends down then sits up with my pack of pink panda diapers for bigger girls, thick and white and cute, shooting me a questioning look and trying not to laugh again. "L-Look idol's don't wear diapers, b-but if they did they'd wear the cutest ones they could find okay!?" I fuss as she takes out a fresh one.. A-And another? "I-I onwy need one Maki!" I fuss and kick as she calmly tapes me into the first one, slapping my thigh and taping the second one over it since I don't have much choice.

"Mama knows what's best for her little princess, and Mama's going to make sure you quit being a little brat to Mama." She says, making me gulp as she flips me over, laying me on my tummy and propping my bottom up with a teddy. Oh no, I know where this is going from the moment she grabs my hairbrush.

"M-Maki I don't know what I did to piss you off but I'm sorry, d-don't!" I plead as she sits down next to me, holding my hands against my back and very quickly giving me a smack on the rear with the hairbrush, making me yelp, muffled by the pacifier.

"Now now, try to keep it down Nico-chan, or your sisters might get curious." She says, making me yelp as both cheeks light on fire, tears welling up in my eyes surprisingly fast. "You're going to listen to Mama from now on aren't you? At school to." She says without letting up, smiling as I nod pleadingly. "Good girl, smart baby. Mama was going to keep going until your little bottom was all red like a tomato." She says, sounding a little regretful as she sits me up and strips me of my shirt.

"M-Maki what did you actually come here for..?" I mutter behind my pacifier, gritting my teeth on it and rubbing my bottom as she pauses at my closet, blushing and looking rather nervous.
1153311.title: Scenario 1

11533111.content:
"W-Well I came because I wanted to talk with you in private Nico-chan." She mutters a little quietly, piquing my interest with her reluctant expression as I hug my big panda teddy to cover my chest. "Um, c-can you please forget some of what I did earlier Nico-chan? I got to into playing Mama, and did some really rude things to you even though you're older. You're just so small and cute.." She says while helping me into my normal bunny pj's, a fluffy white top with a hood with bunny ears and pink bows like mine, along with white shorts, completely incapable of fitting all the way over my double diapered rear. If she was really apologetic she wouldn't be dressing me right now, stubborn Maki. I guess her stubborn nature is one of her appeal points though.

"Yeah, I don't mind it, it's embarrassing but I don't think I really mind.. 'playing house' with you involved.." I mutter reluctantly, looking away as both of our cheeks light up crimson and she can't help but hide a grin. So simple, that girl. "D-Don't say anything else though! This is all wrong, I can't have my underclassmen confessing her love for me when I'm all dressed up like this!" She gulps, looking surprised. Did she really think I couldn't figure it out with how she was looking at me today? Though I only had suspicions before.. I'm surprised she didn't figure out how I was staring at her all this time unlike everyone else. "We'll do this properly tomorrow! You can still be the one confessing though, i-it's not right for the super idol to be the one confessing.. Especially to an underclassmen." I mutter, getting quieter as I go on. I'm actually saying all this!? Well, I guess I have wanted this for a while now, just to actually hear it all like this is pretty embarrassing.

"I understand, I'll confess tomorrow properly, as your kouhai." She says gently, smiling as she hugs me, teary eyed. I hug her back tenderly, my own lips curling into a smirk as well.

"You dork, did you think there was a chance of me actually saying no?" I say, wiping her eyes and giggling as she pouts at me. Can you blame me for wanting to feel at least a little older still? "Baka Maki-chan, of course I love you back! Nico-chan loves everyone, but she loves Maki most of all!" I say cheerfully, trying to get back to my bubbly self to get over some of the inherit awkwardness in this situation. "Ah, you smiled! Looks like I'm not as annoying as you pretend I am after all!" I say, gulping as I find a rubber nipple back in my mouth.

"Now now, since we're not going out until tomorrow, I'm still Mama Maki, and you're still a little baby, not super idol Nico-chan. Maybe someday when you're big you'll be as great as Mama is though!" She says as she pats me on the head, pulling me onto her lap with a loud crinkle. I see, she got to embarrassed and is switching it back on me now. Well it's working! I glare at her as she bounces my sore bottom on her knee, smiling at me warmly even as I wince. If it weren't for that spanking out of nowhere earlier this might actually be kind of comforting.. N-No, stop it Nico, don't start getting used to this kind of thing! W-Wait why do I feel turned on!? Must just be because of all the physical contact with Maki.. Normally she never invites all this skinship but here she is all over me.. Guess that's one positive. "Ah, it's already nine thirty... I guess I'll be spending the night." She says, smiling at me apologetically.

"A-Awight.. Wet's get out dewe and finish pwaying house pwease, my sister's need to be in bed befowe Mama-Nico's weal one weal one-Ish home!" I say, the pacifier slurring my words starting to bother me.

"Aww, you sound so cute! You should suck on that all the time, you're also quieter this way." She says, giggling at my glare as she stands up with me in her arms. "Maybe Mama will bring it with her to school tomorrow?" I gulp, shaking my head no meekly as she opens the door. Is she serious..?

"Ah, Nico-chan's all clean! Good job Mama!" "Look at how happy she is now!" My sisters say, getting up off the couch and patting my padded bottom. This is so so so much worse than the pull-ups. "She's even wearing cute diapys this time!" Cocoro says innocently, my heart sinking. I really hoped she wouldn't notice, these could only be mine after all, Cocoro's a smart girl and will figure it out in no time.

"N-Now now, Papa, Cocoa-chan, I was trying to set Nico-chan down for a nap after her change, but she's being a cranky baby so Mama's going to feed her then lay her down, please don't be loud around her because Mama wants her to be tired." She says as she carries me to our small dining table, the two nodding and zipping their lips. Without hesitation she places me in Cotarou's high chair, which I barely fit in, locking down the tray and patting my head with a smile as I squirm uncomfortably. "Ah, wait a minute, what time is bedtime for you two? Will Nico-chan have to call your Mama?" Maki says in her regular voice as she turns around to face my siblings. They both gulp, looking at the clock.

"W-What time is it onee-chan?" "It's a little bit past bedtime! Th-Thank you for playing with us today, Nico onee-chan, Maki onee-chan!" Cocoro says, bowing and dragging Cocoa off to their bedroom hurriedly. Thank god she's a responsible girl.

"Good job Maki-chan.. When I twy to do dat pwa-ptew!" I spit out the pacifier, glaring and placing the bulbous thing on the tray. "When I try to do that while we're playing they just say the baby's babbling and keep going until they get tired." I say, sighing. "N-Now hurry up and get me out of this thing!" I whine, swinging my legs and tugging on the tray. The lock is on the back under the seat, out of any child's, or my own, reach. Uh oh, she's just grinning as she walks over to the cabinets.

"Now why would I do that? Until Nico-chan's asleep we're not done playing, so you're my precious little girl until then." She says, returning with a jar of mashed peaches and a big pink flowery bib. I whine and try to push her away as she ties the bib around my neck, gulping and freezing as her stern gaze meets mine. "Nico-chan, Mama really likes spanking fussy girls you know? You just earned a punishment, keep it up and it will escalate into a spanking." She says, smiling as I gulp and let her tie the bib on reluctantly, opening my mouth for the first spoonful of peaches. "And if you're still naughty after a few spankings, Mama will tell Santa what a naughty girl you've been!" I can't help but laugh as she pushes another spoonful into my mouth, the mush going all over my bib and mouth. That's right, this girl still believes in Santa Claus! She jumps a little in surprise and looks at my confused, smiling before wiping my face with a handkerchief and feeding me more. "See, it's not so bad when you're a good girl, wight? Mama doesn't want to spank her wittle princess as much as she wants to just see her smile!" She says grinning as I smile.

"N-No! It's not all the baby stuff, y-you're just hitting on my princess fantasies, okay!? I know for a fact you have them as w-mm.." My protest is quickly muted as she shoves the last spoonful into my mouth, patting my head and cleaning off my face before removing the bib, pulling up the tray and lifting me into her arms once again. Am I really that light..? "A-Ah um.. punishment.?" I ask nervously before she puts the pacifier back into my mouth, looking down at the ground. If she's putting me to sleep, then it has to happen now.

"Oh, don't worry, it's simple. Any more daytime accidents, whether we're playing house or not, and I get to start potty training you again." She says, bouncing me in her arms as a sigh escapes my body. Yeah, okay, that's fine as long as she's not here, I'm going to try to never play House again so it shouldn't happen. "Oh, you think you got off easy? You're getting two pictures taken then, one getting spanked so Mama can remind you to quiet down when you're feeling rambunctious, and one just looking cute on Mama's lap." She says. Well, that is considerably worse.. I gulp as we enter my room, sitting down on the side of my bed and quickly bending me over her knee, my tip-toes on the carpet and my bottom raised. "You're taking the picture, Mama will check afterwards and keep spanking until you get a good one." She says, putting her phone in my hands. I gulp, my legs shaking as I try to prepare myself, my entire body in frame. The hairbrush suddenly kisses my padded bottom after what feels like an eternity, making me shout and jump, not even hitting the camera button. My red headed misstress merely chuckles as she delivers a slap on my other cheek, taking the phone out of my hands as she notices I succeeded this time. "There we go, good girl. See, things aren't so bad when you listen to Mama." She says, setting me on my bed, pushing my pacifier in my mouth as I almost spit it out. My ass feels like it's on fire, she went full force, one more of these and I'm buying a paddle and sneaking up on her to avenge my pride. Why am I getting wet over this!?

"Loveu Nico~" I say as she takes the picture, making a heart with my hands. She sets aside the camera once she's done, giving me another diaper check before tucking me in under the covers, kissing my forehead.

"I'll explain to your Mama how tired you were if she comes early, see you in the morning sweetie." She says, my face burning as she kisses my forehead then leaves, leaving the door slightly cracked. How did I fall in love with this girl..? Will I be okay when she clearly wants to keep me wetting myself like this..? Well, I can think about that when I wake up, hopefully dry.
11533111.title: Love confession

115331111.content:
"Nico-chan, Nico-chan wake up." I groan and turn red as violet eyes greet me awake under red curtains, my underclassmen kissing my cheek and smiling, blushing herself. That's right, all of that happened, I wasn't dreaming... Crap that means I soaked myself.. Ew it's still warm to. Ah, I'm getting teary eyed again already and my lips are quivering.. Yeah I guess anyone would feel this way after wetting themselves in front of someone they wanted to admire them, twice now actually. She gasps, hugging me and stroking my hair. "Nico-chan what's the matter?"

"N-Nothing, my eyes are just dry in the morning!" I say, pouting as I turn away, looking out the window. I want to look at her longer though, she's wearing my pink nightgown, it's so small on her, she's showing so much skin... "Hyi!" I gasp as she throws back the covers and pulls down my shorts, feeling the moist padding get pressed between my legs and crinkle softly as she gropes my diaper.

"Really? Nico-chan, I-I woke up thirty minutes ago actually and changed you while you were still asleep so you wouldn't have to wake up in such a humiliating way. S-Sorry." She says, pulling back the waistband to peak inside my undergarments. D-Does she really think I might have done something else in my diaper to!? Come to think of it, I'm only wearing one diaper now, so she must have changed me.. How much control have I lost!? I woke up pissing myself again, with Maki-chan essentially watching to boot... This is the worst.. "It's okay Nico-chan, I think it's cute! W-We'll get over your accidents together, okay?" She says, not wasting a second as she grabs my waist and pulls me over to the side of my bed on my back, looking up at her through teary eyes with my legs spread wide. She wipes away my tears and pats my head, holding up the pacifier I kept having to suck on last night and moving it towards my mouth.

"M-Maki-chan put that thing away! I'm not sucking on it!" I say sternly, trying to make sure I don't sound mad at her. She smiles apologetically, setting it aside and pulling down my shorts. It feels like she takes an excruciatingly long time just to open up the dirty diaper, the tapes tearing loudly before she slowly unveils my pussy, smiling and holding my hand as she wipes me clean. Maki's actually really good at this... She'd make a good mother, it's almost a shame, she made me more comfortable so easily. "Y-You were being rough last night on purpose!" I mutter as soon as I realize, Maki unable to help a giggle.

"Hyaaan! Nico-chan thank you for preparing lunch bo-"My mother yawns and pauses as she enters the room, both me and Maki flushing crimson. "Nico-chan, your bedwetting hasn't gotten any better?" She says exasperated as she gently pushes Maki aside, both of us speechless as she calmly goes about cleaning me up, doing her best to not look disappointed in me as she throws out my dirty diaper.

"M-Mama you knew!?" I finally manage to choke out the words as she powders me, smiling up at me.

"Of course I knew silly, I even came in to check you and change you some mornings when I had to go to work early. You think there's something about my biggest baby girl I'd miss like that even though I'm so busy? Oh um, n-not that you're a baby for wetting yourself or anything!" She says, smiling as she gets out a new one, placing it under my bottom. I'm getting depressed thinking about how many times I was proud of myself for waking up dry now. W-Wait, another diaper!? "Thanks for taking care of Nico-chan, Maki-chan, I approve of you two having 'that kind of relationship'." She says cheerfully, Maki stammering and shaking her head no. "Oh please, don't try to lie to me, you two must be closer than friends if you're accepting even this pottypants side of her!" She says, ignoring my gasp at the little jab. Maki nervously plays with her hair, unable to hide her quivering smile. I wonder if her mother would approve the same way..?

"W-Wait Mama, why are you putting me in another diaper!? I can't go to school wearing that!" I cry out as I realize she's pulling the thick padding up between my legs, realization hitting her and Maki before she can start taping it up.

"I'm sorry sweetie, normally I'm not changing my babies out of diapers and into panties." My mother says, smiling apologetically and moving to pull the diaper away, looking up in surprise as she notices Maki fastening a tape on. "M-Maki-chan?"

"S-Sorry for being so forward Yazawa-san, but Nico-chan hasn't used the bathroom in the last twelve hours at least, she wet herself when I arrived earlier and has only used her diapers since! S-So I think she should have some protection for a day or two at least, it would hurt her reputation if everyone saw her wet her panties.." Maki says, a lump forming in my throat as my mother looks me in the eyes, hers full of disappointment. That hurts more than any spanking Maki can give me, pierces right through my heart.

"Sh-She's telling the truth Mama... B-But that's the first time I ever wet myself while I was awake! I don't need to wear diapers to school I promise, s-so please don't!" I plead, teary eyed as she quietly puts another tape in place. "M-Mama please, I was surprised and scared by M-Maki, it really wouldn't happen again, especially in f-front of Cocoro and Cocoa!" I say, starting to kick gently and squirm in retaliation as she gets the last two tapes in place, my diaper now on snugly. "I'm not a damn ba-kya!" I quiet down as she gives me a slap on the bottom, flipping me over onto my stomach. Oh no, please don't...

"Young lady I am very disappointed in you. Is this how you want to be treated in front of your girlfriend, who's younger than you?" She says sternly, making me scream out as she starts slapping my padded bottom, the shock going right through the diaper. "I don't have time for this.. I was fine with wetting the bed, and even your accident yesterday, because you got the diapers yourself and it seemed like you were trying to fix it!" She says, ignoring my crying and kicking as my bottom turns red, Maki holding my hand and trying to get me to quiet down. You're enjoying this damn it, you do'n't fool me! "But now you're making excuses and trying to get out of wearing diapers to solve your problem because it's embarrassing!? And now you're talking back, trying to shift the blame on Maki-chan, and even pissing yourself in front of your sisters!? I raised you better than this, you're eighteen now for crying out loud Nico-chan!" She only gets louder as she scolds me, grabbing my waist and slapping extra hard as I try to turn over. My ass is going to start bleeding any second now, idols can't take this much damage at a time! "Do you think idols piss themselves Nico-chan?" She says, giving me an extra hard spank again.

"N-N-No mama I-I'm sorry! I'll wear my diaper! It's noone's fault I'm having accidents but mine!" I shout out, mama sighing. I sob into my sheets as she finally stops, rubbing my bottom while Maki pats my head.

"That's right, good girl, you always did learn fast.... What am I going to do with you, I want to help but I need to go to work now..." She says sadly as she gets up, checking her phone. Her eyes light up as I sit up on my knees hugging Maki-chan, who hugs back gently. "Maki-chan, I'm sorry to spring this on you all of a sudden, but is it okay if I put you in charge of Nico-chan's potty training?" She says, bowing as Maki looks flustered. "I really do want Nico-chan to be back in panties and enjoying herself as an idol again as quickly as possible, but I simply can't be around! But you're her girlfriend, and you don't mind changing her! I-I can't give you any babysitting money-"Babysitting!?"-But I'll try to talk with your parents about you two if they don't like your relationship, though I'd do that anyways.." My mother mutters, starting to be at a loss for words. "Oh um, is it alright with you, Nico-chan? I'm sorry I'm not leaving it all to you, but I don't feel like I can trust you to tell the truth after not telling me about ay of these accidents." She says, the lead weight of guilt dropping in my gut as I realize she's right. But it would have been so humiliating.. Well, less than peeing myself in front of Maki...

"I-It's fine by me.." I mutter hesitantly, Maki smiling and stroking my hair.

"I'd be happy to help Yazawa-san, don't worry about i-U-Um.. H-Hello Cocoro-chan, Cocoa-chan.." Maki says awkwardly as she notices my siblings standing in the doorway looking curious, quickly burying my face in her chest before I even look.

"Mama why's Nico onee-chan in a diaper? We stopped playing house Nico onee-chan.." Cocoa says, sending a spark up my spine as she pats my bottom, Mama quickly pulling the two away and speaking quietly.

"N-Now you two don't tell Cotarou-kun, okay? This is what happens to girls when they lie to their mamas, hide things from them, and act nasty to mama and her friend, and even wets herself in front of her little sisters, right?" She says, looking over at me.

"Y...Yes... I-I'm sorry for wetting my diaper in front of you.." I managed to stammer out between my tears, clinging to the comfort of my girlfriend.

"Nico-chan's a naughty girl right now, but one step closer to being the good girl Mama knows she is for telling the truth. Now Nico-chan won't stop being a super idol because of being naughty for a little bit, okay? Even super idols make mistakes, so you two should tell me now if you have been hiding anything from Mama while she drives you to school if you want to stay good girls." Mama says, winking as she leaves the room, the two angels following behind her teary eyed, confessing things like losing one of their toys or calling someone a mean name. Thank you for covering for me Mama, but I don't think they'll forget this anytime soon.
115331111.title: Morning

1153311111.content:
Me and Maki sit there hugging for a good twenty minutes before I finally stop crying, my bottom still throbbing as she rubs some soothing lotion onto it, partially because we were waiting for my family to leave. "Sorry about this Nico-chan, I didn't warn you that she was back even though I talked with her last night. I didn't think she'd walk in without knocking first." Maki finally speaks up, taking her hands out of my diaper as she finishes rubbing in the lotion, wiping off her hands with wet wipes. "Come on, we ended up waking up early, but we need to get ready for school. I can text Honoka that you had to handle your siblings this morning so you don't have to show up at morning practice and leave ahead of you if you want. Your mother even texted that it's okay with her if you take a sick day." She says, blushing dark red as she takes off my nightgown. Her boobs are so cute without being small like mine, and her body's so nice... Hehe, it's all mine now! Well, soon.

"N-No, I want to go to school with you.." I mutter, sniffling and biting my lip, Maki trying to keep her cool as she misbuttons her shirt. Hehe, I'm mostly calm now, but if I can get her all flustered then I'll definitely try. "A-And there's one more thing I'd like you to do only for today, if you don't mind... It'd make Nico-chan feel a lot better about her problem." I say, getting up and getting off my own top. At least I still get to change my own clothes, right now.

"I.. S-Sure, what is it Nico-chan?" She says, sighing. She must feel guilty for mentioning my accident, what a pure girl! She gulps and blushes crimson as I hold up one of the last pairs of the pull-ups I outgrew, opening her mouth to say no but freezing as I rub my eyes, reluctantly taking it and removing her white panties, pulling up the pink pull-up under her skirt. "N-Nico-chan this feels small on me.. E-Even though I'm wearing this you don't get to peak at it, okay!? Stop smiling so much, it's creepy." She says, her cheeks flaring up as she tugs on her skirt. Hehe, she'll be a beacon compared to me.

"I can't help it, I'm just so happy to know you care so much about me Maki!" I say as I get my skirt on, the first year turning away from me and fanning herself trying to calm down. Guess I was a little to cute for her there. Oh well, she'll have to get used to it. "Makiiii, tell Nico if her skirt seems long enough! A school idol needs all the cute and sexy appeal of a short skirt, but if it's to short.." I mutter, turning around in front of her now fully dressed, unable to help but tug on my skirt sometimes as well.

"Th..This seems fine as is." She decides pretty quickly, looking like she's about to explode as she ties her bow, gulping at my sad expression. "I-It looks adorable Nico-chan, I wish I could see even more of your gorgeous legs!" She says quickly. Hehe, compliments from Maki for a change feel so good, I might just get addicted to this! I gasp as I feel her pull up the back of my skirt and grope my padded crotch while I'm putting my ribbons in my hair, watching the blood rise to my cheeks in the mirror while she feels my crotch and bottom up with some noisy crinkles. "Besides, it gives me easy access for checks at this length." She says, looking delighted as I slap her hand away.

"D-Don't do that!" I fuss, unfurling my skirt to get it another centimeter longer, tugging on it as it stops just above my knees. I've never worn it this long before, someone is bound to notice. "And call me Nico now, Maki.."

"Well how else am I supposed to text your Mama the condition of your diaper every three hours?" She says, making me swallow another lump in my throat. "Since I'm tasked with not only potty training you again but also thinking of how to potty train you, you'll follow my rules N..Nico. Got it? I-I'ts not like it's convenient for me to be checking you so often like this either, okay!?"

"P-Please, I know you want to be groping me every hour if we weren't in different classes! You can hardly keep your hands off me!" I cry, Maki glaring at me this time. "F-Fine though, since I don't have much choice.. We'll meet in the clubroom for lunch and between classes when we need to so you can check, it should be clear." I mutter, hugging her while she hugs back gently. "Tell me the rest of the rules on the way to school." I say, holding her hand, bag in hand, which she quickly puts some diapers and changing supplies into before smiling at me, leading me out the door. This feels like it's crinkling really loudly as I walk... Couldn't I wear cloth instead..?

"If I find out you had an accident without telling me at any point, I'll find the closest private spot and give you a spanking then and there." She says, reminding me of my throbbing bottom. Really hope she doesn't find any if I do.. "I'll also spank you if you're being difficult during a check or change, or I see any other reason to, so be a good girl." She says. You'll definitely find a reason. "Your Mama texted that she's called the nurse and you're expected to go to her if you have an accident in the middle of class, and let her change you, Mama already made sure she has everything you need in your size so no excuses." Oh great, a stranger changing me..."You'll be sleeping where I can keep an eye on you, at your house most nights and at my house every now and then."

"Staying at your house sounds fun, and my siblings won't be able to see me." I say, pouting as she shakes her head no. Guess she doesn't like the idea of having company. "S-So um... How exactly is any of this going to help me.. Use the bathroom if I'm not making it on my own..?" I whisper now that we're getting on the train.

"I'm not quite sure yet... You'll get a reward or punishment every day for either keeping your diaper dry or the number of times you've used it. I'm not sure what yet, but I want you to wear panties normally so it won't be to easy, and if you barely use the potty at all I get to baby you all of Sunday and at home if I want to." I gulp, feeling a little intimidated by her hopeful smile as she holds my hand. "So if you're a very good girl or a very naughty one, I'll be having fun either way. I'll start treating you more like a senpai again in private when you get back into thinner diapers, Nico." She says, giggling as I slap her hand while she pats my diaper under my skirt. "Of course, if you tell me you need to go potty, I'll happily help you. So just tell me when." She says. Great, my younger girlfriend, condescendingly treating me like a pants wetter... I guess I am, but no way it will happena gain.. Liek that at least.

"C-Can we stop talking about this stuff now?" I mutter, sighing as she nods. The rest of the ride was fairly uneventful, talking about school idols and the music Maki's working on for our next performance, the other girls, how Nozomi-chan and Eli-chan are totally making out when nobody's looking. Arguing over whether pandas or panthers are cuter. Now that she's opened up some more, Maki's actually pretty easy to talk to about a lot of things. She made me completely forget I was even wearing a diaper until we met Hanayo and Rin on the way to school, my crinkling undergarments becoming increasingly louder in my ears as I tried to be my usual energetic self, with a bit of stumbling since we told Honoka I hurt myself helping Maki move some things around last night so I don't have to practice today. Thankfully no gym either due to the cold weather.

"I'll see you between classes two hours from now." Maki whispers in my ear before getting pulled up to the roof for practice by Rin, the two of us waving goodbye. I sigh as I walk down the corridor to the third years' room, a little relieved that nobody around me will know that I'm in diapers now but also a little anxious since I've been glued to tomato girl's side since last night, and ya know, the diaper. Well, I'll have a while before classes start since I came here at the same time as Maki. All my work is handled, so I may as well just lay my head on the desk and take a nap as I wait for the rest of the class to slowly fill in, idols need their beauty sleep after all and mine was cut short by my bladder.
1153311111.title: Get ready for school

11533111111.content:
Light filters in through my eyelashes as I rejoin the world of the conscious, yawning softly and looking around curiously. It would seem class has started, so why wasn't I woken up..? "Nozomi-chan, what gives?" I whisper to the tit monster in front of me, who looks back and smiles.

"The teacher didn't want to wake you up since she figured you were probably up super late doing idol practice trying to save our school." She whispers back, smiling slyly. "You and Maki-chan, doing all sorts of idol stuff, right? Can you feel each other's spiritual power right now?" She says her eyes sparkling. Oh great, what rumors are going around now from Maki's poor lies about why we came to school together? Thankfully Eli gives her cohort a tap on the shoulder to quiet town, smiling knowingly as she waves at me before turning back to the teacher. I feel like she saw right through my skirt or something... There's no way she knows though, right? Of course not... Wait... Under my skirt...

"Oh no.." I whisper under my breath after I've realized why I woke up, my cheeks flushing pink despite my best efforts to stay calm, biting my lip and gripping my skirt as I finish wetting myself at my desk. Okay, so falling asleep during school is definitely off the table... Maybe Maki will give me a freebie on this one..? But I can't see Maki right now, I have to see the nurse, I've never even been there before... "E-Excuse me, I need to go see the nurse, I forgot to stop by before class began to um.. Get my wrist looked at, I banged it up on the way in." I say holding my left wrist, struggling to come up with an excuse on the spot. My diaper is odor locking, but I still feel like the embarrassing smell of my accident was on everybody's nose somehow.

"You may be excused, Nozomi-chan could you please take her?" The teacher says, Nozomi smiling and getting up, taking my right hand and leading me out of the classroom. The washiwashi machine is perceptive, I feel like my diaper's crinkling even louder as I walk alongside her. Why couldn't it be Eli, she'd at least keep quiet if she found out, I think.

"So, who's on top and who's on bottom? Judging by how you squirmed in the seat and what the cards tell me, Nico-chi's the bottom." The violet haired woman says, blood rushing to my cheeks. She thinks I'm sore because of Maki... Fucking me hard last night? Oh jeez, why is she such a pervert... Still, I can't let such a rumor spread! In this way anyways.

"I-I'm on top of course! Maki's all pathetic and pleads for it in bed.. Th-That's all I'm saying though, and only because it's you! Idols don't typically share this kind of information, so I'd appreciate it if you don't try to tarnish my image further." I say, Nozomi merely chuckling as she opens the door.

"Ah, Nico-chan! What's the matter?" I freeze as a familiar chirpy voice greets us, Kotori-chan sat in the nurse's chair wearing a white and green nurse outfit with hearts plastered all over it, more like a magical girl's costume than a nurse's. That's right, she's the nurse's assistant or something, right? I think I overheard Honoka mention how the nurse can only come in on certain days now due to budget cuts... Crap.. Kotori and other assistant students must cover the office on every other day.. "Nozomi-chan, do you need some help to?" She says worried, grabbing both of our wrists and having us sit down on a cot, the plastic mattress thankfully covering up my own crinkling.

"O-Oh well, it's a bit private, so I'd prefer if we could wait until Nozomi-chan leaves to discuss it." I say quickly. If I had to chose anyone other than Maki to find out, Kotori-chan is probably the best, she's so kind there's no way she'd let this slip, she may actually be an angel in disguise!

"Nico-chan I was about to say the same thing, I needed to go to the nurse to actually, but it's private." Nozomi mutters, pouting. Oh great, what business does she have, does she need herbs for her spiritual power or something?

"Honoka-chan's been saying that we should try to get closer recently, so I think that if it doesn't concern me specifically you should both admit what you need at the same time! Please!" Kotori says, giving us both a pleading look, her 'please' echoing through my head. Oh jeez, I almost feel like I can't say no now.. Maybe if I give her a hint she'll understand? I feel myself flush crimson as I start to raise up the right side of my skirt while diverting my gaze out the window, hopefully flashing my wet diaper to only birdy here. Nozomi doesn't seem to be looking, fiddling with her own skirt, probably looking for her cards. "Ah, N-Nico-chan!?" Kotori cries in surprise, my heart skipping a beat as Nozomi looks over curiously, instantly dropping my skirt. "I see.. That explains the package... Okay, I figured out what you're here for now to Nozomi-chan, sorry for being such a birdbrain." She says, giggling andtaking our hands, leading us to the nurse's private room and locking the door.

"Kotori-chan, can't you handle whatever Nico-chan needs before getting to me please? It's really not that urgent." Nozomi says as we stop in front of the nurse's desk, Kotori shaking her head no. "K-Kotori-chan it's already embarrassing enough that I have to come to you like this, please." Nozomi mutters uncharacteristically as Kotori presses a button on the desk, the top unfolding and opening up to change into.. That's a changing table!

"Nope! She'll be fussier so I'll get to her second! Don't be so shy Nozomi-chan, you're both here for the same thing after all." She says, much to my disbelief as she gets my peer to lay down on the changing mat, slipping her hands into soft cuffs above her head. Surely enough when she lays down her diaper is on full display, very soaked and discoloured, thick and bulging with a wire running into a leghole connected to a controller poking out of the top of her thigh-high black socks, the buxom girl flushed crimson.

info.brief_description: Love Live fanfic where the characters ended up diapered. ABDL content within.
info.description:
No central plot, just choose your character and go.

-No gore, vore, inflation, weight gain, character deaths or fatal injuries, boys, or ending.
-Make her wet/mess, make her embarassed.
-Sex is fine as long as it's nothing extreme, not terribly frequent, and does not involve minors
-Have fun.
